Author: yomishino
Name: ActionEffectRange
Description:
This plugin provides a visual cue on the effect range of the AoE action you just used.

May be used as a supplement/replacement to the actions' VFXs in showing effect range related information, such as where has the action landed and how large an area it covered.
Punchline: Provides a visual cue on the effect range of the AoE action just used.
Changelog:
Patch 6.1 update
(Note: Please expect incorrect drawing for some of the new skills added in Patch 6.1. I'm working on fixing it.)

- New option to display effect range while casting 
- Cone AoE drawing customisation
